overview: Ngantih (Spinning Yarn) is one of the traditions of residents in Tumagal Village, Pengadegan District, Purbalingga Regency since the 1980s. Even though the Tumangga fabric has been exported, the residents of Tumangga Village and its surroundings only produce the yarn. It takes the support of many parties so that the entire Tumagal community is able to manage the whole ecosystem of fabric products.
title: Spinning Yarn
